data.text: Bila mbi ngeyo Yave telimini thama e ?
Bila mutu wumbimbi wulembo kiniemisa mu nzinunu zi ntima andi ;
Mu luniemo luandi, mutu wumbimbi kantombanga ko.
Mu zithangu zioso, zinzila ziandi zidi zimboti
Wumfielanga banga bumfiedilanga khosi bu kadi mu nsuku
Weti kuba kosikisa, bawu beti tumbu vonga ;
A Yave Nzambi, telama, vumuna koko kuaku ;
Bila mbi mutu wumbimbi keti lenzila Nzambi e ?
Yave niandi ntinu mu zithangu zioso
A Yave, ngeyo weti wa zitsatu zi batu badi mu phasi.
Mu diambu di nuanisa muana sana
